rows.label: qst400104_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello there, Rex! I'm Iruiru,
proprietor of Whiteside Salvaging, mo!

rows.label: qst400104_msg0002
rows.name:
I know who you are, Iruiru-san.
I was just thinking of coming
to check out some cylinders.

rows.label: qst400104_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, that's perfect timing, mo! Iruiru
just got a new type of cylinder. If you
have time, would you test it out, mo?

rows.label: qst400104_msg0005
rows.name:
Rex is the rising star of the salvager
world! If you give it your seal of approval,
it'll be easier for me to sell, mo!

rows.label: qst400104_msg0006
rows.name:
It's not every day you get
to test a brand-new product.
I'd be happy to!

rows.label: qst400104_msg0007
rows.name:
It's settled, mo! Come to
the rear deck later. I'll
get everything ready, mo!
